sentences.sContent: Their map has since been superseded by photographic atlases.
sentences.sCn: 他们的地图从此被摄影地图册取代。

synos.tran: 取代，代替；紧接着……而到来

remMethod.val: super(在…之上) + sed(坐) + e → 坐在别人的位置上 → 代替； 取代

trans.tranOther: if a new idea, product, or method supersedes another one, it becomes used instead because it is more modern or effective
